definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

the best part of the show is yet to come/(with ironic tone) the worst is yet to come/you ain't seen nothin' yet
